author: Luis Felipe
content: I have over 100 hours played, I can say that the game is not perfect, but it is what every anime/manga fan wants to see, their favorite characters together. I've been waiting a long time for the global version, and my impression is that the project has been abandoned, or they're simply not giving it the importance it deserves. This game gained a lot of fame in a short time, but many people have already forgotten about it due to the delay in its global release. I feel like they made a mistake in releasing this version too early. The game no longer has hype, which can decrease the profit and life of the game. Great chance of becoming just another abandoned anime game.

author: Naru
content: I play this game for two days already, so i expected it to be same like other moba game in terms of a lot of aspect. The way u guys decided to use anime character in moba game is already good idea ngl. But what i really feel unfair abt this game is, how tf the matchmaking is soo BADDDD?!! Whenever i met other players (NOT BOT) in game rank or normal, they were all players who were higher rank and have higher expert in terms of hero they use. Me as beginner player keep getting a beginner player in my team while ENEMY have whole nova player with hero expert more than 10... It so bullshit and unbalance. Another thing, a beginner player doesnt have much hero they can choose in their match, when we met player who play longer than us who have more choices than us, who have more experience than us, tell me how tf we can win the game. FIX THE MATCHMAKING SYSTEM YOU HAVE RIGHT NOW BEFORE YOU RELEASE THE GAME. I didnt stop trying in ranking, until i keep playing the normal match as well just to see how the team matchmaking unfairness ongoing in this game. And now i am done, i realise i will never get a fair matchmaking in this game. I am gonna uninstall it, so enjoy to those who think this game is fun.

author: Luis Felipe
content: I have over 100 hours played, I can say that the game is not perfect, but it is what every anime/manga fan wants to see, their favorite characters together. I've been waiting a long time for the global version, and my impression is that the project has been abandoned, or they're simply not giving it the importance it deserves. This game gained a lot of fame in a short time, but many people have already forgotten about it due to the delay in its global release. I feel like they made a mistake in releasing this version too early. The game no longer has hype, which can decrease the profit and life of the game. Great chance of becoming just another abandoned anime game.
